name: UNITED HUMANITY FOUNDATION (UHF)

address: F-117, Hari Nagar Ext., Jaintpur Rd., Badarpur,

briefDescription: The United Humanity Foundation, a non-governmental, a not for profit organization was establish in 2014, and registered  under the Indian Act 1882. The Founder, Sensei Dalbir singh panwar has been working in various important sectors of the society, especially health, life-skills, development and self-defense. He is also a professional Karate Teacher and National Karate Referee.Focusing Area:Improving the status of Education in Rural India.Improving the status of Health in rural Parts ofIndia.Engaging youths in Sports and Cultural Exchange, and Promoting Traditional Games.Empowering Women towards trade and investment, and in small business sectors.empowering citizens to take responsibility towards environment and water management.

address: F-116, Hari Nagar Ext., Jaitpur Rd., Badarpur,
